title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, the ultimate solution for all your gardening needs! Made with durable steel mesh, this cart is not only sturdy but also versatile. The removable sides allow you to easily convert it into a flatbed cart for larger items. 

With quick assembly and a tight turn radius, maneuvering this cart around your garden is a breeze. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure a smooth ride, while the ample ground clearance lets you navigate over various terrains with ease. 

Equipped with a 400 lb capacity and 3 cu ft volume, this cart can handle all your gardening supplies effortlessly. The straight pull handle and 4-wheel design make it convenient to use, while the green color adds a pop of freshness to your outdoor space. 

Backed by a 1-year limited warranty, this Gorilla Cart is a reliable and efficient tool for all your gardening tasks. Don't wait, get your hands on the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart today and make your gardening experience a whole lot easier!
